metadata.title: CVE-2023-20917 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In onTargetSelected of ResolverActivity.java, there is a possible way toshare a wrong file due to a logic error in the code. This could lead tolocal escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID:A-242605257

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
